title: Demolish can damage an invincible turret in practical tool
body:
Not a big matter but I just find out that demolish can damage the invincible turret after it charges up.
It can also destroy the turret too 
And I want to try to report a bug once :)
Nice job riot and have a nice day

Best
Felix

replies.body: hold on why does it pierce invincibility code how is it coded to do that.

That bug has been around for quite a while.

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/Qfme79eI-gameplay-demolish-can-damage-turrets-while-tower-invulnerability-is-toggled-on-in-practice-tool
